metadata.name: System File Execution Location Anomaly
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a Windows system binary that is usually located in the system folder from an uncommon location.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\atbroker.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\audiodg.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\bcdedit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\bitsadmin.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\certreq.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\certutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmstp.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\conhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\consent.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dashost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\defrag.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dfrgui.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dism.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dllhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dllhst3g.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dwm.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\eventvwr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\logonui.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\lsaiso.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\lsass.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\lsm.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msiexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ntoskrnl.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\runonce.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\runtimebroker.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sihost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\smartscreen.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\smss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\taskhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\taskmgr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\userinit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wininit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\winlogon.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\winver.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wlanext.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wsl.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wsmprovhost.exe'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\$windows.~bt\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\$winreagent\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\softwaredistribution\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\systemtemp\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\uus\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\winsxs\\\\')) OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('c:\\\\program files\\\\powershell\\\\7\\\\pwsh\\.exe', 'c:\\\\program files\\\\powershell\\\\7-preview\\\\pwsh\\.exe') OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\windowsapps\\\\microsoftcorporationii.windowssubsystemforlinux')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wsl.exe'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\systemroot\\\\system32\\\\')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a Windows system binary that is usually located in the system folder from an uncommon location.
